StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateAdjustedBusinessPercentage]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Recrui.ngOrgID int, @FiscalYear int, @Month int, @TCPercent int, @OTPercent int, @ACPercent int, @HVPercent int, @DCPercent int, @LastEditBy varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT ORGANIZATION_ID FROM [dbo].[ADJUSTED_BUSINESS_PERCENTAGE] WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MONTH_CODE = @Month)
BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[ADJUSTED_BUSINESS_PERCENTAGE] SET TC_PERCENT = @TCPercent, OT_PERCENT = @OTPercent, AC_PERCENT = @ACPercent, HV_PERCENT = @HVPercent, DC_PERCENT = @DCPercent, USER_LOGIN = @LastEditBy, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID = @Recrui.ngOrgID AND FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND MONTH_CODE = @Month END
ELSE
BEGIN INSERT INTO [dbo].[ADJUSTED_BUSINESS_PERCENTAGE] (ORGANIZATION_ID, FISCAL_YEAR, MONTH_CODE, TC_PERCENT, OT_PERCENT, AC_PERCENT, HV_PERCENT, DC_PERCENT, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@Recrui.ngOrgID, @FiscalYear, @Month, @TCPercent, @OTPercent, @ACPercent, @HVPercent, @DCPercent, @LastEditBy, GETDATE()) END
